metadata.title: St. Patrick's Day Holiday Glitter Headband Head Bopper - Costume or Dress Up Fashion Novelty Accessory - for Adults or Kids Party Fun Green
features: A festive accessory for your St. Patrick's Day party or any fun event!
The green plastic headband is adorned with glittered shamrock and rainbow pot of gold St. Patrick's Day symbols as bouncing boppers!
Will fit most adults and children (band is not adjustable).
Each hair bow measures approximately 11 inches tall (including headband).
WARNING: Choking Hazard. Contains Small Pieces. Not suitable for children under 3 years of age.
